body: Day 18 - Manga 403* At first I was like "Pretty average, not bad, might give it a 4/10." but then I saw the two dicks furry and that killed whatever non existent boner that I might had. The only good part was the Chun-Li one. 1/10.
this is the could have been worse one 3/10
Don't really like the art all that much and I don't understand the plot either 4/10
